title: AirHopper
extract: By compromising the machine's video display adapter, AirHopper is able to transmit the stolen data to a smartphone with an FM receiver function, which can direct it to an SMS inbox or remote internet server via malicious code.Nov 27, 2014
extract_html: By compromising the machine's video display adapter, AirHopper is able to transmit the stolen data to a smartphone with an FM receiver function, which can direct it to an SMS inbox or remote internet server via malicious code.Nov 27, 2014
